Number 01R11-230738, Hydraulic Soil Samplers
=================================================================
### Title
Hydraulic Soil Samplers (3 Unit Purchase)

### Synopsis
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires three wheel-mounted hydraulic soil sampling machines.

### Publication and Expiration Dates
- Published: July 11, 2023
- Expiration Date: August 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM

### Delivery Details
The machines will be delivered to the following locations:
- Agassiz, British Columbia
- Summerland, British Columbia
- Grande Prairie, Alberta

### Tender Terms
- Category: Goods and Services
- Tender Type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement Method: Competitive
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
- Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others
- Regions of Delivery: British Columbia and Alberta

### Government Agency and Contact
- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Phelan, Samantha (SPAC/PSPC)
  - Email: [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
